title: Eminent Drive ditches shock tunnel for geometry-adjustable high pivot eMTB
content:
Eminent Cycles has released a High Pivot eMTB with enduro-worthy travel numbers; the Eminent Drive. Despite the overhaul of their AFS suspension platform, the Drive is unmistakable as an Eminent with the massive seat stay rocker and isolated dropouts. But, it is not simply an Onset with a motor and battery slapped on it; far

The post Eminent Drive ditches shock tunnel for geometry-adjustable high pivot eMTB appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
